answers.answer:
You can register for the Romanian language course at one of the IOM offices located at the following addresses:
- Viitorului Street, no 11, Sector 22, Bucharest
- Constantin Daniel Street, no 5, Sector 1, Bucharest
These offices are open from Monday to Friday, from 9:00 am to 5:00 pm. For more information about the program and class locations, visit the office during registration. The email address to contact for inquiries is iombucarest@iom.int.
